website_summaries.verdict: Tasty canned food that helps medium breed dogs maintain a healthy weight. Can be fed by itself or mixed with dry kibble.
pros: Contains plenty of protein and fiber to help dogs feel fuller and lose weight
Especially good formula for dogs that are not overly active
Texture of the canned food may be easier for older dogs to chew and digest than dry food

customer_reviews.title: Explanation for Loose Gravy
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who also feed your dog this food, I'm sure you have noticed that the gravy in this food is much looser than normal. I reached out to Hill's today to ask if the "recipe" has changed and they provided the following information - for those that are interested: Perfect Weight Hearty Vegetable & Chicken Stew Dog Food Canned has not been reformulated, however early in 2018 we transitioned to a new rice starch supplier due to raw material availability. We too have noticed loose gravy since this change. While this has no impact on nutritional value, we are testing a new gravy recipe that would provide a thicker gravy consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Mostly juice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this food for about 6-8 months now, but the last 2 cases I received were not up to the usual standards. About half the cans (5-6 from each case) were mostly juice...I mean more than half a can of it! See photo of a 6 inch saucer. That was an entire can of food, minus all the extra juice I threw away. At the price I paid for this it is not acceptable!! I am changing companies!
customer_reviews.author: KC's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about the BY-product ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about the BY-product ingredients. This can mean anything( styrofoam, roadkill, expired beef etc...) also it says it's made in the USA with imported ingredients. Like I said it could be anything. I expected more quality ingredients and willing to pay for it, but not getting Hills science diet anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Krashman67

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This made my dog poop blood. I changed her food because the vet told me she was gaining weight and I thought Science Diet made quality products. First of all, this is NOT grain free. I didn’t even think to look because I was in a hurry. All I saw was “healthy weight” and “Science Diet.” I am furious right now. Just spent the last four nights up at three in the morning thinking my dog was DYING because she shat blood. Switched her back to Instinct and she is fine. Unbelievable!!!! I thought about donating this to the local shelter but no pet deserves this. It’s going in the dumpster. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: GYPSY JUST LOVES THIS CANNED DOGFOOD
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, Gypsy is 15 years old and over the years has put on more weight than is healthy. She particulary likes the Hill's Science Diet Canned Wet Dog Food, Adult, Perfect Weight for Weight Management, Chicken & Vegetables. We add some of Hill's Science diet weight management type dry dog food and when we use this canned version, she never notices that there are some dry morsels hidden in the delicious wet canned dog food. I recommend this dog good to anyone who has a their own dog who needs to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Work but make my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was happy at the beginning with this product, my dog was eating it happy and after two weeks she went from 42.2 lb to 41.2lb I was happy and she seem to be fine. Right now we are finishing our third week and she started having bloody diahrrea, and she doesn’t want to eat Hill’s Science any more, I’m really worry about her and this is the only thing that I change on her diet, I feel is something weird, but I’m going to stop feeding her with Hill’s cause I’m worry it can go worse. For losing weight was working but seems is making my dog sick after a few weeks u.u
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 yorkies and they all seem to love this food. It mixes great with dry dog food to give them some extra needed flavor. There is plenty of "gravy" in the can so it mixes well. I use the subscription for these dog food as the price is fair and I don't have to worry about forgetting to order. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: House OF Yorkies

customer_reviews.title: This can food is the best product for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This can food is the best product for weight loss. Our dog needed to loose weight significantly. She love this food. We give her both entree and stew (occasionally). I think entree is better for weight loss. If your dog is fast eater, buy entree and use a spoon to press the food in bowl. Usually our dog finish her food in 15 sec.But with this technique, it takes about 5 minutes to finish her food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weight Loss Success
customer_reviews.text: My chiweenie was put on a diet by the vet! She weighed in at 17lb 3oz!! She looks fantastic now...it's been 3 months as it seems dogs lose weight slowly. I mix this with the dry food (same type), and a little water. She only gets 7/8 cup of food per day, so I give her 2/3 cup dry dog food, with 1/4 cup of the moist and some water. Mix it up with a fork, and she's happy! And she looks so beautiful now! Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after my dog experienced weight gain. After a month or so I went back to Merrick which I will probably stay with. The Merrick in both appearance and smell seems superior to this brand. The first thing I noticed after opening the can of the Science Diet was how much grain there appears to be. White rice is not necessarily conclusive to weight loss in my opinion. Read the ingredients folks.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an xl breed who put on a lot of weight before we started getting him treated for hypothyroidism. This food has been out go to. Can’t speak to the flavor but my megamutt loves it. You can see the rice and veggies in the food which is nice considering a lot of the time the food is so processed you can’t actually tell what’s in it. He’s already started to slowly lose the weight along with exercise. But he’s a big fan of the food, we will definitely keep with it as a monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great food for chubby pups
customer_reviews.text: We have a mixed dog who is about 4-5 lbs overweight (a lot for her size) as well as suspected food allergies. When we started her on science diet (the dry version) her allergy conditions improved. We added this wet food to her meals and she really loves it. Her symptoms improved even more. Not a whole lot of weight loss happening yet (3 months later) but we suspect she may also have thyroid issues so it might not be the food's fault. Only complaint is that the first case of this we got was really watery, hardly any meat. The last shipment we had is much thicker-- so there are consistency issues it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet34Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: Works in helping your dog lose and maintain weight (watch other treats). I did not use for awhile due to the manufacturers having a recall in December 2018 in which several or more pets died from the adding of too much vitamin D to the dog food at the manufacturing plant. My dog only had half a can and had an adverse reaction on Christmas day while visiting family. It was very troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weight is perfect food as far as my pooch is concerned.
customer_reviews.text: We went through quite an involved process finding the right food for our pooch. He rejected most as not sufficiently tasty to bother with, including all kibbles. A number of others he would only eat with a lot of encouragement. Several of those caused him indigestion, gas, allergic reactions, anal gland issues, and/or the runs. Even tried Darwin’s, an expensive fresh frozen combo of meat & organic greens. Darwin’s contained bone shards that caused Boris to vomit blood. We settled on Science Diet Perfect Weight Chicken Stew because Boris is crazy for it and it keeps him healthy and active.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Pork is #2 ingredient
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had noticed that before giving this to my dog ... she wolfed it down the first half case or so, but she's gotten more and more resistant to eating it, and I've noticed a lot of urping and general stomach upset. Turns out pork product is #2 ingredient. I was looking for chicken for a reason, doesn't bother her stomach. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lady_M

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Flavor must be good my dogs eat it up. I have a 19 year old dachshund with a very sensitive stomach and this is a dog food he can eat and enjoy although it is pricey and you will never get coupons or find this on sale this dog food also keeps his weight down since he does not exercise much because of arthritis he tends to put on weight quickly . I buy the chicken stew
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my poodle all of the time and decided to try it from Amazon. When I received this it was all spoiled and I had to literally throw it all in the garbage. I traveled to my Vet’s office to get Bella a fresh batch of her fav food. Only thing I can think of is that it is being left out in the heat too long.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Zumpano

customer_reviews.title: foreign ingredients and by products
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA with global ingredients. There are 16 global countries listed inc China, Thailand, Indonesia, Chile, etc. This means they CAN import as much as 100% or 1% of the ingredients. Also of the over 40 ingredients, the 5th is listed as powdered cellulose. Guess if you add enough flavoring to it they will eat styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: You can actually see all the vegetables in this dog food. My dogs go crazy when I add it to their dry food. They love it! and because it's weight management they have lost the extra weight and have kept it off!
customer_reviews.author: azluvnlife

customer_reviews.title: Dog started licking paws after eating this.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another flavor of this brand with my dog (beef was main content). He had been putting on some weight so decided to try out this for weight management . The very next date, my dog started licking his paws all day long. So I stopped this and switched to another brand (from local super market) and the licking stopped. Everything I read up seems to indicate that one cause for licking of paws is food allergy. I still gave this a 3 because the other flavor did not cause any issues. Not sure what is in this one that is different. Anyway stuck with a bunch of cans of dog food. Will donate it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sethumadhavan

customer_reviews.title: Great brand for weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a brand you can trust. My beagle is a breed proned to gaining weight as they age and my little girl packed on the pounds, total Covid depression, but still, so we started her on this and a supplement and she’s gonna be bikini hot by next summer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Eckols

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm feeding a 19 month old lab pup who eats everything in site. I feed her the grain-free dry food and mix the Science Diet with it. I do not feed her this every day but alternate with other Science Diet canned foods. I'm just trying to keep her weight in the healthy range, as she tends to pack it on for a lab. Bottom line is she likes it and I feel better about her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: very very dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once before and really liked it so I bought 2 cases and set up for re-accuring delivery. When I got the cases the food was so dry it was almost like powder. I had to add water to it so it would mix with the dry food. It also had a funny horrible smell to it. I have discontinued the delivery on it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Z

customer_reviews.title: What does it take to cancel this order???????
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for TWO months to cancel this repeating order and every month it reappears. I NO LONGER HAVE THE STUPID DOG! I DON'T NEED THE STUPID FOOD! .......... never had any problem with Amazon before but this is ridiculous. aggggggggggg
customer_reviews.author: ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Risk of Botulism
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 cases of 24. Both cases had been opened and out of 24 cans, 8 of them were dented. That's 33%! Cans that are dented have the potential for botulism.
customer_reviews.author: sCOOLmarm

customer_reviews.title: My dogs would not eat at first
customer_reviews.text: My little dogs usually eat Ceaser wet dog food. One of them is getting fat. Even though I. Had not get them they were hungry and would not eat it. I am diappointted. Here is update. They finally accepted it and I am hoping for weight lose
customer_reviews.author: cynthia k durrer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Since we changed to perfect weight, our dog has become slimmer and healthier. She is up there in age and was getting a little heavy, but since the change, she is at a better weight.
customer_reviews.author: ROY

customer_reviews.title: Wet dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love science diet foods have been using it for years. They get canned food once a month, other wise I use dry science diet. I have 2 labs
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but 5/7 of the cans were spoiled and had to be trashed. Update, between 24 cans of food over half were spoiled. Horrible sour smell when opening and had to be trashed. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roosa

customer_reviews.title: As dried out as week old rice. Solid/hard
customer_reviews.text: These cans were as dried out as old rice. Amazon refunded me my money and I purchased a case of Wag, Amazon’s own brand. My tiny picky dogs love it. I didn’t have time to reasearch the ingredients however.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie

customer_reviews.title: A lot of liquid
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy this food for our dog all the time...then the quality changed, and now about 1/3 of the can is liquid. Was worth the money when the can was full of actual food, but I am not paying the same price for 1/3 liquid. Changed to Nutro without regret.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product..Picky Dog
customer_reviews.text: I believe in this product however, I don’t have to eat it! My best friend is without question..picky! But, he does not like it at all! I am sure MOST dogs would like this because Hills knows what they are doing. So I am only giving this product three stars simply on the advise of my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C. Marth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect low cal food
customer_reviews.text: Just what my girl, Keela, needed to help her lose weight. She loves it and that makes me happy. She has lost 5.4lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N Sully N Keela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this because of its quality and I have to say that my dog loves it. Since he is the pickiest creature ever, I'm glad to have this for him because he actually eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really does work!
customer_reviews.text: My staffie needs to lose weight. I divide this can into threes and put a third on his prescription diet food. It has the least amount of kcalories and in four weeks, Hunter lost 6 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Okay dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Couple cans exploded when opened, which tells me they are bad so I tossed them in the garbage. This is the one food my dog can tolerate, but even he knows which cans are bad. Not sure why this happened to this batch.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: that my dog will eat it
customer_reviews.text: Like that this is canned dog with diced meat/veggies and gravy not something ground up.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied Customer, poor product handling
customer_reviews.text: I received a case of dog food that was totally mangled. Out of 12 cans 2 were dented, 2 were actually crushed and one was crushed so badly that food was spilling out of it. There are always some dented cans that I'm never happy about but this was totally unacceptable. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The food is recommended for weight control. Our senior dog has been eating it for quite a while and she is able to maintain her weight, but moreso she still likes the food and consistently eats it. I also use the Perfect weight dry food.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wardell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: this is a great dog food and my pet store was out. ordered from amazon and arrived 2 cases, one can completely open and all over the other cans. also had some bugs hatching out from being I guess in the heat. also had another item in the box & was damaged & had to be thrown out. not sure what happened I have never been dissatisfied with Anything I have ever purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rene D.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: I like to supplement my dogs dry kibble with Hill's canned foods. As long as you ship the canned food by itself it doesn't crush other products in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Dog Food is great, The packing needs attention!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our monthly delivery and it had been dropped. Several cans were damaged, one to the extent that the product leaked out throughout the entire box. It was a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila L Connally

customer_reviews.title: Broken can smeared.
customer_reviews.text: I received the food today and noticed a can was totally broken, food was smeared all over the remaining cans. The rest of cans were dented. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stylus pens

customer_reviews.title: Good food, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Package came with one open/broken can that I had to throw away. Other cans were dented and my can caps don't work. Other than that, my dog loves it, and she is starting to slowly slim down.
customer_reviews.author: Goldier

customer_reviews.title: known for being a great dog food
customer_reviews.text: the vet said try this when she was sick, now our minature Aussie eats daily
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Frozen food
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived during our deep freeze here in Michigan and was partially frozen. Must have been in a cold warehouse or in the back of a delivery truck for some time. The product was fine and the dog enjoys the food. Will try to time the next order when we aren't having below zero weather.
customer_reviews.author: Farmington Flash

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not eat it! She let herself go hungry for 2days before she forced her self to eat! He vet put her on this food , but I worried to much !
customer_reviews.author: PamelaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cans in shipping
customer_reviews.text: We received this canned dog food. There were at least 6 of the 12 cans that were dented and unsuitable for feeding our dogs. We are pleased with the product but feel that these 6 cans should be replaced. Also, we ordered wet cat food (Friskies oceans delicious) and that was damaged as well (at least 3 cans). Please let us know when we can have a replacement. Thank you, Jeanette Hunt - 2828 Monocott Drive, Madera CA 93637 - jhunt1938@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Hunt

customer_reviews.title: I keep getting damaged products!
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting cans that are dented! I don't see anywhere to contact Amazon about this issue - so I'm leaving a review. Buyer beware - I've been getting these cans for a while and sometimes as many as 5 cans in the package are majorly dented/damaged to the point where I don't feel comfortable using them, which is a waste of money. I'm seriously considering giving up Amazon and just going to Chewy. They also have free 2 day shipping most of the time so...yea.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but worth it to get my dogs weight down. Been using this for a while now. I also give her the dry version
customer_reviews.author: Toni S

customer_reviews.title: Food might be unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Been subscribing this product for my 2 years old Pom. After stated on the latest shipment, she started to have diarrhea and vomiting. And last night she had a seizure for the first first. We stopped feeding her this food and is taking her to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: april417

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but seems to be of good quality and my dog likes it. This is the fourth or fifth case I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hills Science Dog Food is Healthy for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I am confident when my dog eats Hills Science Diet that she is getting what she needs every day and keeps her healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia B Grisdale

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service. Hills is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My lab loves the Sensitive Stomach samon and vegetables. He no longer has stomach issues. Love the subscription feature, no carrying heavy cases or having to run to store at the last minute because your out of food. Most always comes early.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: My Dog is Allergic to this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had allergies in the past. I've fed her other Hill's Science foods before and she has done great. I fed her 3 cans of this and she already has a rash on her mouth and feet. I'm sad that Hill's dog food isn't consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Halstyn hart

customer_reviews.title: Great product perfect mixed with biscuits
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies the stew style especially mixed in the their biscuits. They’ve lost weight and maintaining the loss.
customer_reviews.author: Clarita PinkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fell Victim to the Recall
customer_reviews.text: Done with Hills. My dog fell victim to the recall. He was not feeling good. Poor little guy was miserable and so is my wallet from vet bills with no answers. Switching food brands. Including treats. Not worth it to us.
customer_reviews.author: Aime

customer_reviews.title: For the most discerning (diet) palate...
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loved this product and I was thrilled to be able to order it on here as my store kept running low on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi Colter

customer_reviews.title: Always fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are about the same as at the pet store, but would prefer they are delivered to our house.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! She currently weighs 85lbs and should weigh around 65lbs. This food is easy to mix a half can with cup of weight mgmt dry and she eats twice daily. She seems more active and digests more, poops less (yes, gross) haha
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good food and helped my fur baby loose much needed weight
customer_reviews.text: My min pin is a runt and should weigh about 6 1/2 pounds. But she was up to nearly 11. The vert urged me to put her on a strict weight loss regime. She seems to really like this food, although many others have said their dogs won't even touch it. I supplement it every now and then with some dry food,m but after about 3 weeks, she's down nearly a full pound.
customer_reviews.author: The Home Show Hostess

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Cost.
customer_reviews.text: Pups would NOT eat this dog food. Turned their noses up and walked away. Too expensive as well. Told vet that HSD was out of question.
customer_reviews.author: Rita R Myers

customer_reviews.title: So great, the cat even wanted some!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome! Needed my baby to drop some weight and decided to use this stuff to get him there along with a vet monitored diet plan, and 6 months later he’s as sleek as an otter! Awesome stuff. And he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Marie

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Science Diet Canned Wet Dog
customer_reviews.text: Family members normally called dogs like the flavor and has teddy eager to eat.
customer_reviews.author: jjm

customer_reviews.title: More appealing from A to Z
customer_reviews.text: You can see chunks of real food in these cans: chicken, veggies, gravy. It seems healthier and smells a lot better, too. Thank you for making something that does not have that mass-produced appearance. My pup loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: I informed by my dog's Vet that my dog is allergic to the chicken in this food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to chicken. Just found out from Vet as to why the itching and irratation...its from this particular food.
customer_reviews.author: WMS

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with product
customer_reviews.text: I have to give a hands down. It looked great but as soon as we gave to our dog. He got sick and we had to take to vet for bloody stools . We went back to our normal brand and and evthing went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: LHMC

customer_reviews.title: Dog Not Crazy About This
customer_reviews.text: Tried this to mix with Diabetic Prescription food that dog hates. He doesn't like this either (Prefers ProPlan and Pedigree brands), but will eat it if mixed with some non-prescription food.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My girls love this Hills food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are on Hills Science Diet Metabolic. Every now and then I buy this for a special treat and taste. Besides who wants to eat the same thing everyday? My girls love this Hills food.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: bad or rotten
customer_reviews.text: dog food smells rotten, faul and once opened my dog refuses to eat it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Battersby

customer_reviews.title: I like this because it seems to be helping my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it seems to be helping my dog lose a bit of weight. I don't like that it smells fishy but my pup loves the stuff and the price is okay. I didn't give it a perfect rating because a few cans of the package were dented in.
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: product
customer_reviews.text: Please delete this order as she, my dog doesn't like this can dog food. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Glover

customer_reviews.title: Pups LOVE this mixed with their kibble
customer_reviews.text: The pups were bored with just kibble so we add 1 teaspoon of this to their kibble each meal and voila they are exceedingly happy. YAYYYY
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Warren

customer_reviews.title: It the dog food I ordered and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I did not order the cat food, it is the dog food that I received. My dog loves it and we have noticed her loading weight, looking better and having more energy.
customer_reviews.author: ROY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We were quick to order, but upon looking at the ingredients I don’t recommend. For the price, you can find much more nutritional alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mimande

customer_reviews.title: received damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a case of this wet dog food and also a bag of dry. The order came together. 4 of the 12 wet cans were damaged and one of the can's lids had been crushed and had leaked on the other cans as well as the dry dog food bag. Not a happy camper. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: brenda hughes

customer_reviews.title: I was cheated of an entire case.
customer_reviews.text: My order for 4 cases that I have been receiving cane with only 3 yesterday. And it appears I have no repercussions but to return or order again neither of which is acceptable. This is my dogs food!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves the food, I love the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it, and that’s mostly what matters, but it’s also so much easier for me to subscribe to monthly deliveries. I don’t have to lug more heavy items from the grocery, as I’m disabled from several back surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O. Peek

customer_reviews.title: My Harley Girl Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is spoiled rotten and a picky eater, she loves this food! The Chicken Stew
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Watery
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes it, but gravy is super watery. Something doesn’t seem right with it.
customer_reviews.author: VBonz

customer_reviews.title: We need to dispose of about 5 or more  boxes
customer_reviews.text: 2019 recall due to to .uch vitamin d in it causing dog health problems
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Speirs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Hope she can lose some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dygert

customer_reviews.title: Dog food very good. Packaging terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packed!! One can burst and sprayed all the other cans. Had to wash all the other cans to salvage them. Burst can thrown away but it was a terrible mess. Packing needs to be improved for heavy items like this!
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: CANNED DOG FOOD

customer_reviews.title: Its all about the ingredients!

customer_reviews.title: Following the feeding guidelines will safely & effectively result in a perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to prefer a stew over a solid pack wet food. I mix this with Hills Ideal Balance small breed chicken & brown rice, dry food. When I adopted my Jack Russell, she was was a little heavy for her short legs. Since feeding her the Perfect Weight, she has steadily regained a defined waist and has even more energy!

customer_reviews.title: Normally Great, but...........
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this! Originally prescribed by our vet, now we feed it to her every day. However, this order was not so great; there were two cases of dog food in the box, with absolutely NO packaging. As a result, 40% of the cans were dented.

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Canned Wet Dog Food, Adult, Perfect Weight for Weight Management, Chicken & Vegetable Recipes, Pack of 12
product_meta.description: Style:Vegetable & Chicken | StewHelping your grown dog keep a healthy weight doesn't have to be difficult. Hill's Science Diet Adult Perfect Weight Hearty Vegetable & Chicken Stew is breakthrough weight management nutrition with clinically proven technology for healthy weight maintenance and long-lasting weight support in your adult dog. Over 70% of dogs lost weight within 10 weeks when fed this dog food made with natural ingredients. This premium canine recipe is also a great source of high-quality protein to support lean muscle in your dog. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas. Not recommended for puppies and pregnant or nursing dogs
feature_bullets: Breakthrough weight management dog food clinically proven for adult canines
Over 70% of dogs lost weight within 10 weeks
Give your grown dog long-lasting weight support
A good source of protein to help your grown dog maintain lean muscle
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
